objects.text:
3 Seater Convertible Design
Brown & Beige Premium Chenille Fabric
3 Year Warranty Included
Compact & Space-Saving Design

product_details.name: Adorn India Aspen 3 Seater Sofa Cum Bed (Brown and Beige) (3 Year Warranty)
product_details.description: Size: 4 x 6. Special Feature: Straight. Colour: 7) Brown & Beige. Upholstery Fabric Type: Chenille (Polyester). Product Dimensions: 190.5L x 121.9W x 40.6H Centimeters. Brand: Adorn India. Item Weight: 38 kg. Material: Metal. Age Range (Description): Child. Product Care Instructions: wipe with cloth. Warranty Type: Limited (3 years). Country of Origin: India. Generic Name: Sofa cum bed.

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish and modern layout to showcase a sofa bed product. The top of the banner presents a bold, uppercase main title using the `heading` text layer, followed by the product name in a slightly smaller, yet prominent, `subheading` font. The detailed specifications are provided using the `description` text layer in a clean column format. A centered `product_image` displays the sofa bed, giving a clear product view. The offer price is highlighted using the `price` layer in large, bold text. A rounded rectangular button (`cta_background`) with the call-to-action text `cta` invites viewers to shop. The entire composition is framed by layered strokes in varying opacities and elegant curves.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Beige (#F5F1ED)
- Dark Brown (#8B4513)
- Mid Brown (#A06235)
- Deep Mocha (#59362B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a modern sofa with a minimalist two-tone design, combining a soft beige upper section with a rich chocolate brown base and pillows. The beige fabric (#E8DCCF) provides a warm, neutral canvas that blends seamlessly into living spaces, creating a calm and inviting look. Contrasting this, the chocolate brown (#5C3A2E) at the base and on the pillows adds depth and visual weight, grounding the design while also serving as a highlight accent. The color blending is subtle yet effective, with the brown elements clearly defined but harmonious. Additional accent: Metallic silver legs (#D4D4D4) add a sleek, contemporary touch.
